author: Kiril Nikolaev
title: CDC Commits Unthinkable Errors That Can Send U.S. Coronavirus Cases Skyrocketing
description: CDC released a woman suffering from the novel coronavirus without proper testing. It shunned WHO testing guidelines and created a faulty test. The post CDC Commits Unthinkable Errors That Can Send U.S. Coronavirus Cases Skyrocketing appeared first on CCN.com
content:
